title: Aer Lingus
description: Aer Lingus, Ireland's national airline, features a distinctive color palette embodying its Irish heritage: a vibrant green (#008374), capturing the lush landscapes of Ireland, paired with a fresh, energetic lime green (#89BA16). These are complemented by a clean, crisp white (#FEFEFE) for balance and clarity. This color scheme is highlighted in their Brand Identity System Guidelines available on Issuu.
